servertimeout.desc: Seconds to keep connection alive for non-responding client

serverwsmodule.desc: WebSocket module: 'ws' or 'uws' (install npm package before using uws)

servermaxconnections.desc: Maximum number of connections to the server. (0 for no limit)

port.desc: Server port which will be used to listen for incoming connections

ip.desc: Server network interface which will be used to listen for incoming connections (0.0.0.0 for all IPv4 interfaces)

servertracker.desc: Set to 1 if you want to show your server on the tracker http://ogar.mivabe.nl/master

serverbots.desc: Number of player bots to spawn

serverspectatorscale.desc: Scale (field of view) used for free roam spectators

serverstatsport.desc: Port for the stats server. Having a negative number will disable the stats server.

serverstatsupdate.desc: Update interval of server stats in second

mobilephysics.desc: Whether or not the server uses mobile agar.io physics (0 = false, 1 = true)

badwordfilter.desc: Whether or not the server uses a bad word filter (0 = false, 1 = true)

serverrestart.desc: Amount of minutes between automatic server restarts (0 to disable)

servermaxlb.desc: Maximum number of users to display on the leaderboard

serverchat.desc: Whether or not to enable server chat (0 = false, 1 = true)

serverchatascii.desc: Whether or not chat is parsed in ASCII format only [Non special characters] (0 = false, 1 = true)

separatechatforteams.desc: Whether or not to enable team-only chat in teams mode (0 = false, 1 = true)

servername.desc: The server name shown to clients

serverwelcome1.desc: The welcome header shown to clients

serverwelcome2.desc: The welcome text shown to clients, under the header

clientbind.desc: Only allow connections to the server from specified client (empty for all)

serveriplimit.desc: Controls the maximum number of connections from the same IP

serverminionignoretime.desc: Amount of seconds after startup minions do not detect (0 for no limit)

serverminionthreshold.desc: Maximum connections within Minion Interval which will not be marked as minions

serverscramblelevel.desc: Modifies server coordinate scrambling.(0 = No scrambling, 1 = lightweight scrambling. 2 = full scrambling [Scramble minimap], 3 - high level scrambling [No Border])

playerbotgrow.desc: Whether cells with mass of 625 or more cannot grow from those with 17 mass or less (0 = can grow, 1 = can not grow)

foodminamount.desc: Minimum amount of food pieces on the map

foodmaxamount.desc: [Experimental] Maximum amount of food pieces on the map

foodspawnamount.desc: Amount of food to spawn per Food Interval

foodmassgrow.desc: Whether or not to enable growth by food (0 = false, 1 = true)

virusminamount.desc: Minimum amount of viruses on the map

virusmaxamount.desc: Maximum amount of viruses on the map

mothercellmaxmass.desc: Maximum amount of mass a mother cell may have (0 for no limit)

virusmaxcells.desc: Amount of cells a player may have after hitting a virus (0 for Player Max Cells)

ejectsize.desc: Size of blob per ejection ((size)^2/100 = mass)

ejectsizeloss.desc: Size subtracted from player per ejection ((size)^2/100 = mass)

ejectspawnpercent.desc: Chance for a player to spawn from ejected mass (0 to disable, 1 = 100%)

ejectvirus.desc: Whether or not players eject virus instead of mass (0 = false, 1 = true)

playerminsplitsize.desc: Minimum size required to split ((size)^2/100 = mass)

playerminejectsize.desc: Minimum size required to eject mass ((size)^2/100 = mass)

playermaxcells.desc: Maximum number of controllable cells per player

playerdecayrate.desc: Amount of size lost per second

playerdecaycap.desc: Maximum mass a cell can have before its decay rate is multiplied by 10 (0 to disable)

playerrecombinetime.desc: Time in seconds before a player can recombine

playerdisconnecttime.desc: Time in seconds before a disconnected player's cell is removed (-1 to disable)

minionmaxstartsize.desc: Maximum random size for minion spawn (Set higher than Minion Spawn Size to enable)

minioncollideteam.desc: Whether or not minions collide with teammates in Teams mode (0 = false, 1 = true)

disableertp.desc: Whether or not to disable ERTP controls (0 = enabled, 1 = disabled)

disableq.desc: Whether or not to disable Q control (0 = enabled, 1 = disabled)

serverminions.desc: Number of minions players get on spawn

collectpellets.desc: Whether or not to enable minion pellet collection (0 = false, 1 = true)

defaultname.desc: Minion default name if not specified by command (Use <r> before for random skins)

minionsonleaderboard.desc: Whether or not to show minions on the leaderboard (0 = false, 1 = true)

tourneymaxplayers.desc: Maximum amount of players per tournament

tourneypreptime.desc: Amount of time to prepare for tournament

tourneytimelimit.desc: Time limit (in minutes) of a tournament

tourneyautofill.desc: Amount of seconds after tournament start for bot team leveling (0 to disable)

tourneyautofillplayers.desc: Amount of players needed before auto-fill begins

tourneyleaderboardtoggletime.desc: Time for toggling the leaderboard, in seconds (0 to disable)
